body:
Comment 4 by **cyle@riggsfamilyweb.net**: 
For those looking at this in the future, I guess the following applies here?

http://golang.org/ref/spec#Calls :
"Calling a nil function value causes a run-time panic."

Although obvious in hindsight, it was not immediately obvious that not implementing a
method which exists on the interface is "calling a nil function".
